title: Brooks Scape bikepacking packs add Handlebar Case, Feed & Full Frame Bags
content:
Brooks England expands the range of their Scape bikepacking & bike travel bag collection with three new modular packs to help escape further off the beaten track. Built with the same understated looks and waterproof construction as the original setup, the new rando-style Handlebar Case, bar bottle bag Feed Pouch, and Full Frame Bag add

The post Brooks Scape bikepacking packs add Handlebar Case, Feed & Full Frame Bags appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
